thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Jefta Rorimpandey
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Jefta Rorimpandey

author: Jefta Rorimpandey
title: Jefta Rorimpandey
text:
I always visiting Tomtop website to get the best offer products.
For better service to all of buyers, we advice Tomtop to process more faster to dispatched the order.
Tomtop would be better if every transaction was finished to deliveries with buyers, completed comments and received packaged notification.
Hope Tomtop would be Bigger and Worldwide online shop.
Thank you.
